option.od: print the help message and exit.
filenames of the vfit format files.

synopsis.p: Tests the integrity of cfit format files by reading them and printing the contents.

description.p: Tests the integrity of cfit format files by reading them and printing the contents.
The contents are written to standard output

example.description: Test the integrity of the file "20040830.gbr.cfit", paginating using more.
